00012 //**********************************************************
00014 //**********************************************************
00015 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kMaxStates, const unsigned int kMaxEvents >
00016 class UStateMachine
00017 {
00018 public:
00019         typedef bool ( _T::*Callback )( unsigned int prevState, unsigned int event, unsigned int newState );
00020         typedef void ( _T::*UpdateCallback )( unsigned int curState );
00021 
00022         UStateMachine( unsigned int initState );
00023         ~UStateMachine();
00024 
00025         unsigned int    GetCurState() const                     {       return _curState;               }
00026 
00028         void                    SendEvent( _T* thisPtr, unsigned int event );
00029 
00031         void                    Update( _T* thisPtr );
00032 
00035         void                    SetTransition( unsigned curState, unsigned int event, unsigned int toState, Callback callback );
00036 
00038         void                    SetStateUpdateCallback( unsigned int state, UpdateCallback callback );
00039 
00041         void                    SetStateEnterCallback( unsigned int state, Callback callback );
00042         void                    SetStateLeaveCallback( unsigned int state, Callback callback );
00043 
00044 private:
00045         unsigned int    _toState[ kMaxStates ][ kMaxEvents ];
00046         Callback                _transitions[ kMaxStates ][ kMaxEvents ];
00047         Callback                _onEnter[ kMaxStates ];
00048         Callback                _onLeave[ kMaxStates ];
00049         UpdateCallback  _onUpdate[ kMaxStates ];
00050         unsigned int    _curState;
00051 };
00052

00054 //==========================================================
00056 //==========================================================

00058 //----------------------------------------------------------
00059 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kMaxStates, const unsigned int kMaxEvents >
00060 UStateMachine< _T, kMaxStates, kMaxEvents >::UStateMachine( unsigned int initState )
00061 : _curState( initState )
00062 {
00063         MemSet( _toState, 0xFF, sizeof( _toState ) );
00064         MemSet( _transitions, 0, sizeof( _transitions ) );
00065         MemSet( _onEnter, 0, sizeof( _onEnter ) );
00066         MemSet( _onLeave, 0, sizeof( _onLeave ) );
00067         MemSet( _onUpdate, 0, sizeof( _onUpdate ) );
00068 }
00069 
00070 //----------------------------------------------------------
00071 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kMaxStates, const unsigned int kMaxEvents >
00072 UStateMachine< _T, kMaxStates, kMaxEvents >::~UStateMachine()
00073 {
00074 
00075 }

00082 //----------------------------------------------------------
00083 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kMaxStates, const unsigned int kMaxEvents >
00084 void
00085 UStateMachine< _T, kMaxStates, kMaxEvents >::SendEvent( _T* thisPtr, unsigned int event )
00086 {
00087         B_ASSERT( event < kMaxEvents );
00088         unsigned int toState = _toState[ _curState ][ event ];
00089         if ( toState == ~0 )
00090                 return;
00091 
00093         unsigned int prevState = _curState;
00094         if ( _transitions[ _curState ][ event ] != 0 )
00095         {
00097                 if ( !( thisPtr->*_transitions[ _curState ][ event ] )( _curState, event, toState ) )
00098                         return;
00099         }
00100 
00102         _curState = toState;
00103         if ( _curState != prevState )
00104         {
00105                 if ( _onEnter[ _curState ] != 0 )
00106                         ( thisPtr->*_onEnter[ _curState ] )( prevState, event, _curState );
00107                 if ( _onLeave[ _curState ] != 0 )
00108                         ( thisPtr->*_onLeave[ _curState ] )( prevState, event, _curState );
00109         }
00110 }
00111 
00112 //----------------------------------------------------------
00113 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kMaxStates, const unsigned int kMaxEvents >
00114 void
00115 UStateMachine< _T, kMaxStates, kMaxEvents >::Update( _T* thisPtr )
00116 {
00117         if ( _onUpdate[ _curState ] )
00118                 ( thisPtr->*_onUpdate[ _curState ] )( _curState );
00119 }
00120 
00121 //----------------------------------------------------------
00122 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kMaxStates, const unsigned int kMaxEvents >
00123 void
00124 UStateMachine< _T, kMaxStates, kMaxEvents >::SetTransition( unsigned curState, unsigned int event, unsigned int toState, Callback callback )
00125 {
00127         _toState[ curState ][ event ] = toState;
00128         _transitions[ curState ][ event ] = callback;
00129 }
00130 
00131 //----------------------------------------------------------
00132 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kMaxStates, const unsigned int kMaxEvents >
00133 void
00134 UStateMachine< _T, kMaxStates, kMaxEvents >::SetStateUpdateCallback( unsigned int state, UpdateCallback callback )
00135 {
00136         _onUpdate[ state ] = callback;
00137 }
00138 
00139 //----------------------------------------------------------
00140 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kMaxStates, const unsigned int kMaxEvents >
00141 void
00142 UStateMachine< _T, kMaxStates, kMaxEvents >::SetStateEnterCallback( unsigned int state, Callback callback )
00143 {
00144         _onEnter[ state ] = callback;
00145 }
00146 
00147 //----------------------------------------------------------
00148 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kMaxStates, const unsigned int kMaxEvents >
00149 void
00150 UStateMachine< _T, kMaxStates, kMaxEvents >::SetStateLeaveCallback( unsigned int state, Callback callback )
00151 {
00152         _onLeave[ state ] = callback;
